mapper.select: select b.id, b.username, b.avatar, a.expiration_time from usertoken a inner join user b on b.id = a.uid where a.token = #{token}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user ( username, password, avatar, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{user.username}, #{user.password}, #{user.avatar}, #{user.created}, #{user.updated} )
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{user.username}, password = #{user.password}, avatar = #{user.avatar}, updated = #{user.updated} WHERE id = #{user.id};
